author: kmenard
msg: CAY-597: XML Encoder with Mapping outputs incorrect XML.
Added the analogous fix for encoded collections.  This should handle all the problem cases reported in CAY-597 now.

author: erodriguez
msg: Updated JNDI authentication for Kerberos protocol provider to use parameters from Spring configuration as opposed to properties.

author: erodriguez
msg: Clean-up of Change Password protocol configuration.
o  Removal of all code related to map-based configuration.
o  Some parameter names standardized with other protocol providers.
